text: Best IDE for Ruby on Rails
Having moved from Java to Ruby, I am struggling to find a good IDE for Ruby.
I used Eclipse on Java, so I tried Aptana Studio (previously Radrails), but it's not even half as good.
Currently I am trying out NetBeans for Ruby.
Please suggest me the best Ruby on Rails IDE out there.
I believe TextMate is universally accepted as the best editor on Mac OS X. I am looking for Windows.
So far it seems NetBeans and E Text Editor are worth a try.
